overview: Mr. Jeffrey M. Mann is responsible for initiating investment opportunities, structuring acquisitions, coordinating due diligence, negotiating debt financings, working with portfolio company management teams on an ongoing basis and arranging for the disposition of investments. He is also responsible for the financial operations and investor reporting functions at Silver Oak.
